alert.note: Alert for Yuma, Martinez Lake and Vicinity, Lower Colorado River Valley AZ (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 28 at 12:41PM MST until October 29 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /11 AM PDT/ TO 5 PM MST /5 PM PDT/ SUNDAY FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND MODERATE TO HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR THE LOWER COLORADO RIVER VALLEY... The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds, low relative humidity and moderate to high fire danger, which is in effect from 11 AM MST /11 AM PDT/ to 5 PM MST /5 PM PDT/ Sunday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Yuma/Martinez Lake and Vicinity/Lower Colorado River Valley AZ and Lower Colorado River Valley CA. * TIMING...Late Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon * WINDS...North 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * IMPACTS...Fuels are dry and fire danger is moderate to high. These conditions combined with low relative humidity and strong winds will lead to widespread hazardous fire weather conditions. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this red flag warning. &&

area.areaDesc: Yuma, Martinez Lake and Vicinity, Lower Colorado River Valley AZ
